import sys


def winner(numPiles, pile):
	#count number of piles with consistent 
	cnt = 0
	i=1
	while i<= numPiles:
		cnt += pile[i]/i
		i+=1
	if cnt%2 ==0: #odd
		return 'BOB'
	return 'ALICE'



cases = sys.stdin.readlines()
numCases = int(cases.pop(0).strip())

while numCases>0:
	numPiles = int(cases.pop(0).strip())
	pile  = [0] + map(int,cases.pop(0).strip().split(' '))
	print winner(numPiles, pile)
	numCases -=1
